$WmMPID_クワシル,ch00_48_Kvasir_F_Normal,Face|You appear to have fully recovered
now, $Nu...$k$pYou are free to go wherever you will.$k$p...Will you be leaving me behind?$k$pWill you seek out Prince Alfonse?$k$pIt is natural to want to find your
friends again...$k$pAh... Do I hear voices in the distance?
Are they...calling your name? I think
they are coming this way...$k$p$Sbs150|
